name: Basketball Shooter Stars
description:
Basketball Shooter Stars is a free sports multiplayer basketball game that you can play with peoples around the world and kill your free time!
Playing Basketball Shooter Stars you will be impressed by competition that goes between all top players,
so try to be a Star between Top 100 basketball shooter stars!
Basketball Shooter Stars is one from the best basketball games in the sports games that will impress you with:

* AWESOME LOCATIONS *
Grow in Career gameplay by winning online matches in different locations, accumulate more points for your rank in leaderboard and earn more cash to buy more performant basketballs.
Also, you can play online basketball game in shooter racing mode to earn more cash to buy new basketball.
Note: For participate in international competition you've to connect with facebook.

* 3 GAMEPLAY MODES *
Basketball Shooter Stars offer like other basketball games, multiple gameplay modes:
Career Mode - with participation in international competition,
Racing Mode - online matches for earning more in game cash
Offline Mode - single player gameplay without internet connection to pass the time and training you.

* MULTIPLE FREE CASH OPTIONS *
Don't worry if you don't have enough money to participate in a competition because you have options to earn some money without effort, just tap Free Cash button ;)

* NICE GRAPHICS & SOUNDS *
Basketball Shooter Stars is one of the awesome sports games or basketball games in particular and it's designed to impress you every time you play with:
natural graphics, good music and nice effects. Follow us to discover that in future versions of Basketball Shooter Stars!
